com.github.brunothg.game.engine.d2.frame

Class FullScreenGameFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.brunothg.game.engine.d2.frame.FullScreenGameFrame

  • public class FullScreenGameFrame
extends Object
    Fullscreen GameFrame using CanvasStage for drawing.
    Before using this you should test it. With some JVM implementations this will fail.
    Don't forget to build some kind of exit and dispose this frame.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns
